member.name: T:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile
member.summary: Represents a media file and all of its content streams.

member.summary: MediaFile constructor.
member.param: Complete path and name of a file.

member.name: F:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.mediaInfo
member.summary: MediaInfo object

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.filePath
member.summary: Complete path to the current media file.

member.summary: Gets the summary text for this object

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.InformComplete
member.summary: Gets the summary text for this object

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.InfoParameters
member.summary: Gets the summary text of parameters provided by MediaInfo.dll.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.InfoCodecs
member.summary: Gets the summary text of codecs known by MediaInfo.dll.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.InfoVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of MediaInfo.dll.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.InfoUrl
member.summary: Gets the project URL of MediaInfo.dll.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.General
member.summary: General Stream for this media file

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.HasStreams
member.summary: Determines if an opend file contains streams at all. It is very likely that a file isn't a media file, if this method returns false.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.Video
member.summary: Video streams in this file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.Audio
member.summary: Audio streams in this file.

member.summary: Text streams in this file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.Image
member.summary: Image streams in this file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.Other
member.summary: Other streams in this file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile.Menu
member.summary: Menu streams in this file.

member.name: T:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1
member.summary: TypeConverter for the generic lists above. We don't need an editor or setting of a value. The list item are expanded into virtial Poperties for the PropertyGrid.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.CanConvertTo(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Type)
member.summary: Return true, if we can handle this detinationType, otherwise call base class.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.ConvertTo(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Convert the list object into some humanreadble string...

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.CanConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Type)
member.summary: Return true, if we can handle sourceType. We can'T, because item are static and can't be changed.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.ConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object)
member.summary: Return true, if we can handle sourceType. We can'T, because item are static and can't be changed.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.GetProperties(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Object,System.Attribute[])
member.summary: Custom GetProperties method. Splits the List items into separate virtual Properties.

member.name: T:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.StreamListPropertyDescriptor`1
member.summary: This PropertyDescriptor is used to expand the internal lists of stream into separate virtual properties for the stream. So the stream can be expanded in the property grid.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.StreamListPropertyDescriptor`1.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{`1},System.Int32)
member.summary: Initialize our state.
member.param: The PropertyTab that created this Property
The vertex this PropertyDescriptor operates on.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.StreamListPropertyDescriptor`1.GetEditor(System.Type)
member.summary: This allows us to specify the editor that will be used for this property.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.StreamListPropertyDescriptor`1.GetValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the value for the StreamList

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.StreamListPropertyDescriptor`1.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Thsi routine should normale set a value from some object. Obviously we can't change the the data. So just do nothing.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.StreamListPropertyDescriptor`1.ResetValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Abstract base members

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.StreamListPropertyDescriptor`1.ComponentType
member.summary: The type of component the framework expects for this property. Notice This returns List'StreamItemType. That is because the object that is being browsed when this property is shown is a List'StreamItemType. So we are faking the PropertyGrid into thinking this is a property on that type, even though it isn't.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.StreamListPropertyDescriptor`1.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Must override abstract properties.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.StreamListConverter`1.StreamListPropertyDescriptor`1.PropertyType
member.summary: This property is a StreamItemType type property.

member.name: T:MediaInfoLib.Status
member.summary: Status returned by bit 0: Is Accepted (format is known) bit 1: Is Filled (main data is collected) bit 2: Is Updated (some data have beed updated, example: duration for a real time MPEG-TS stream) bit 3: Is Finalized (No more data is needed, will not use further data) bit 4-15: Reserved bit 16-31: User defined

member.name: F:MediaInfoLib.Status.Accepted
member.summary: Is Accepted (format is known)

member.name: F:MediaInfoLib.Status.Filled
member.summary: Is Filled (main data is collected)

member.name: F:MediaInfoLib.Status.Updated
member.summary: Is Updated (some data have beed updated, example: duration for a real time MPEG-TS stream)

member.name: F:MediaInfoLib.Status.Finalized
member.summary: Is Finalized (No more data is needed, will not use further data)

member.name: T:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.AudioStream
member.summary: Represents a single audio stream.

member.name: T:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.BaseStreamCommons
member.summary: Functionality common to more than one stream type.

member.summary: Implements features common to all stream types.

member.summary: Used to create a stream-specific object, such as an audio stream, for use by an existing MediaFile object.

The MediaInfo ID for this stream.

member.summary: Returns an information text containing all detected properties.
member.returns: A string containing all information about a file.

member.summary: Returns a MediaInfo value as an int, 0 if error.

member.summary: Returns a MediaInfo value as a float, 0.0 if error.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.miGetDouble(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a MediaInfo value as a float, 0.0 if error.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.miGetDateTime(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a MediaInfo date, Minval if error.
